thread.title: Will Smith, Arianna Grande & More Star in First ‘Carpool Karaoke: The Series’ Trailer
thread.title_full: Will Smith, Arianna Grande & More Star in First ‘Carpool Karaoke: The Series’ Trailer

author: Daniel Pearson
title: Will Smith, Arianna Grande & More Star in First ‘Carpool Karaoke: The Series’ Trailer
text:
Apple has unveiled the first teaser for Carpool Karaoke: The Series, featuring original host James Corden alongside a glut of huge celebs including Will Smith, John Legend, and Arianna Grande.
The Apple Music exclusive series, which spins-off the wildly successful segment from The Late Late Show with James Corden , won’t, however, feature Corden hosting every episode. Instead, each episode will feature a new host and guest star.
The trailer teases hilarious odd couples like Shaquille O’Neal and John Cena, as well as more action taking place outside of the car as the celebs venture into bakeries, laundromats, and basketball courts.
The company ordered 16 episodes of the show last year, but a release date has yet to be confirmed. Check out the trailer above.
After you’ve finished, take a look inside Daft Punk’s pop-up shop .
